00020 #pragma once
00021 
00022 #include "bits/list_basics.h"
00023 
00024 namespace cxx {
00025 
00026 class H_list_item
00027 {
00028 public:
00029   H_list_item() : _pn(0) {}
00030   ~H_list_item() { l_remove(); }
00031 
00032 private:
00033   H_list_item(H_list_item const &);
00034   void operator = (H_list_item const &);
00035 
00036   template<typename T, typename P> friend class H_list;
00037   template<typename T, typename X> friend class Bits::Basic_list_policy;
00038 
00039   void l_remove()
00040   {
00041     if (!_pn)
00042       return;
00043 
00044     *_pn = _n;
00045     if (_n) 
00046       _n->_pn = _pn;
00047 
00048     _pn = 0;
00049   }
00050 
00051   H_list_item *_n, **_pn;
00052 };
00053 
00054 template< typename T, typename POLICY = Bits::Basic_list_policy< T, H_list_item > >
00055 class H_list : public Bits::Basic_list<POLICY> 
00056 {
00057 private:
00058   typedef Bits::Basic_list<POLICY> Base;
00059   H_list(H_list const &);
00060   void operator = (H_list const &);
00061 
00062 public:
00063   typedef typename Base::Iterator Iterator;
00064 
00065   // BSS allocation
00066   explicit H_list(bool x) : Base(x) {}
00067   H_list() : Base() {}
00068 
00069   static Iterator iter(T *c) { return Base::__iter(c->_pn); }
00070 
00071   static bool in_list(T const *e) { return e->_pn; }
00072 
00073   void add(T *e)
00074   {
00075     if (this->_f)
00076       this->_f->_pn = &e->_n;
00077     e->_n = this->_f;
00078     e->_pn = &this->_f;
00079     this->_f = e;
00080   }
00081 
00082   void push_front(T *e) { add(e); }
00083 
00084   void insert(T *e, Iterator const &pred)
00085   {
00086     H_list_item **x = &this->_f;
00087     if (pred != Base::end())
00088       x = &(*pred)->_n;
00089 
00090     e->_n = *x;
00091 
00092     if (*x)
00093       (*x)->_pn = &(e->_n);
00094 
00095     e->_pn = x;
00096     *x = e;
00097   }
00098 
00099   static void insert_before(T *e, Iterator const &succ)
00100   {
00101     H_list_item **x = Base::__get_internal(succ);
00102 
00103     e->_n = *x;
00104     e->_pn = x;
00105 
00106     if (*x)
00107       (*x)->_pn = &e->_n;
00108 
00109     *x = e;
00110   }
00111 
00112   static void replace(T *p, T *e)
00113   {
00114     e->_n = p->_n;
00115     e->_pn = p->_pn;
00116     *(p->_pn) = e;
00117     if (e->_n)
00118       e->_n->_pn = &(e->_n);
00119 
00120     p->_pn = 0;
00121   }
00122 
00123   static void remove(T *e)
00124   { e->H_list_item::l_remove(); }
00125 
00126   static Iterator erase(Iterator const &e)
00127   { e->H_list_item::l_remove(); return e; }
00128 };
00129 
00130 template< typename T >
00131 class H_list_bss : public H_list<T>
00132 {
00133 public:
00134   H_list_bss() : H_list<T>(true) {}
00135 };
00136 
00137 }
